```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(signal)
library(readxl)
```



```{r osebx, echo=FALSE}
osebx <- read_excel("../data/osebx.xlsx", col_types = c("date", 
    "numeric", "skip", "skip", "numeric"))
View(osebx)
plot(osebx$OSEBX,osebx$Siste,xlab = "Date",ylab = "Daily closing price OSEBX(NOK)", type = 'l')
```

## Daily OSEBX closing prices from 1997 to present, in Norwegian Kroner.

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}
ch <- chirp(seq(0, 0.6, len=10000))
plot(ch, xlab = "Frequency (Hz)", ylab = "Amplitude", type = "l")
```

## The chirp signal, which is typically used in signal processing for detecting signals of unkonw frequency.
